messages.title: ON YOUR SIDE
messages.content: The change we need = We're fed up of same-old Labour and Tories

messages.title: TIRED OF LABOUR?
messages.content: Gordon Brown's Labour party have proved they cannot be trusted and are a disaster. It's time for real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The scrapping of tuition fees for a fairer, more equal society.
Advocates a more equal electoral reform, possibly with the aim to scrap the first-past-the-post system.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour have lost in Bolton West as our chart above reveals in the number of behind. The real battle - The Lib Dems vs. Tories. Vote Lib Dem in Bolton West, the Tories will sneek in and neck with the Tories.

issues.economy: Failed: PM Gordon would have us running to the banks every time we want to ride the risk taker
issues.education: The scrapping of tuition fees for a fairer, more equal society.
issues.governance: In the pockets of most extra in the wallet will pay no local market.

leaflet.personalStatement: The fight for a real change - General Election on Thursday, 6th May has never been so important.
